snippet: The ABC competition show “Dancing With the Stars” is a favorite among political media buyers as they seek out certain constituencies.
abstract: Pres Obama, Mitt Romney and a handful of super PACs have all run campaign advertisements during ABC's Dancing With the Stars, show that boasts a large audience of older women, a key voting demographic.
lead_paragraph: The ABC competition show “Dancing With the Stars” is a favorite among political media buyers as they seek out certain constituencies.

headline.seo: Political Ads Flood ‘Dancing With the Stars’
headline.main: Flooding the Dance Floor With Political Pitches
headline.print_headline: Flooding the Dance Floor With Political Pitches
